dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT BULK_PK, BULK_ID, BULK_DATE_HB_APP, (BULK_BULK_TOTAL_BAGS - CAST(CONCAT('0.', BULK_HB_KGS) AS DECIMAL(23,2)))BULK_BULK_TOTAL_BAGS, BULK_HB_KGS, BULK_BULK_AVE_NYCLOSE, BULK_BULK_AVE_PRICE, BULK_ORIGINAL_TOTAL_VALUE BULK_BULK_TOTAL_VALUE, ((BULK_BULK_AVE_PRICE / 1.1023) - BULK_BULK_NY_CLOSE) AS DIFF, BULK_BULK_NY_CLOSE FROM bulks WHERE BULK_ID = :PARAM_1

SELECT (BULK_STOCK_ID) AS LOTNO, GRADE_NAME AS GRADE, TYPE_DESC AS TYPE, BULK_DET_HB_BAGS AS BAGS, BULK_DET_HB_KGS AS KGS, BULK_DET_BAG_MARKS AS MARKS, BULK_DET_LIQOUR AS CUPPING, BULK_DET_COMMENTS AS COMMENTS, BULK_DET_PRICE_50 AS PRICE, (BULK_DET_PRICE_50 / 50) * ((60 * BULK_DET_BULK_BAGS) + BULK_DET_BULK_KGS) AS VALUE, BULK_DET_NY_CLOSE AS NYCLOSE FROM bulk_details LEFT JOIN types ON bulk_details.BULK_DET_TYPE_CODE = types.TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN grades ON bulk_details.BULK_DET_GRADE_CODE = grades.GRADE_CODE WHERE BULK_BULK_PK = :BULK_PK
